name: Article Extractor and Summarizer
description: This is an API which extracts news/article body from a URL and uses GPT to summarize (and optionally translate) the article content. Useful for text mining purposes. Leverages powerful and flexible web scraping engine (ScrapeNinja.net) with high-quality rotating proxies under the hood. In depth review and API implementation details: https://pixeljets.com/blog/gpt-summary-is-broken/ . My video where ChatGPT summary capabilities are explored: https://youtu.be/hRQqJtgYz_Q

api_methods.name: /summarize
api_methods.description: Summarizes the article after extracting it from the specified url.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Target language to translate summary into

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: pass TRUE if you want to convert new line symbols in API response text with html paragraph tags

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length in paragraphs. This parameter might be ignored for a very long articles.

utterances.utterance: Can you summarize the article from this link: https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-65443210?
Summarize the content of this URL in French: https://www.lemonde.fr/international/article/2023/05/15/la-crise-politique-en-france-s-intensifie_6174563_3210.html
Extract and summarize this article in 2 paragraphs: https://www.nytimes.com/2023/05/14/world/europe/ukraine-russia-war.html
Summarize this article and format the response with HTML tags: https://www.theguardian.com/world/2023/may/15/china-us-tensions-rise-over-taiwan
Can you summarize this article in Spanish and keep it to 3 paragraphs? https://www.elpais.com/internacional/2023-05-15/la-guerra-en-ucrania-se-intensifica.html
Summarize the article from this link: https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2023/05/15/biden-trump-2024-election/
Extract and summarize this article in German: https://www.spiegel.de/politik/deutschland/2023-05-15
Summarize this article in 4 paragraphs and use HTML tags: https://www.reuters.com/world/us/2023/05/15/us-china-tensions-escalate-over-taiwan/
Can you summarize this article in Italian? https://www.repubblica.it/esteri/2023/05/15/news/
Summarize the article from this URL in 1 paragraph: https://www.cnn.com/2023/05/15/politics/us-politics-news/index.html

api_methods.name: /extract
api_methods.description: Extract an article body and markdown version of the body.
